about.title: About Me
about.primary: I'm a Computer Engineering student at Concordia University and an Embedded Software Developer at Genetec. I specialize in reliable systems that bridge hardware, firmware, and cloud.
about.secondary: I lead the Systems Sub-Team for Concordia’s SAE AeroDesign 2025 VTOL Drone (2nd place overall), build secure embedded integrations, and design scalable software architectures.

projects.title: Autonomous VTOL Drone (SAE AeroDesign)
projects.description: Led the systems integration and software stack for an autonomous payload-capture drone using OpenMV and ArduPilot. Achieved 2nd place overall at SAE AeroDesign East 2025.

projects.title: Navixy Reports Microservice Stack
projects.description: Containerized full-stack analytics platform (React + Node.js + MySQL + Nginx) with CI/CD via GitHub Actions and Docker Compose.

projects.title: Nextcloud Self-Hosted Server
projects.description: Personal cloud storage hosted on VPS with Traefik, Docker, and SSL automation — integrated into a private home-lab setup for data management and backups.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I’m always open to discussing embedded systems, full-stack development, and cloud infrastructure opportunities.
